name: Deeper into Carnage
description:
Plot (lel)

After the witch put a curse on you, everything went black... the next thing you remember is being on a creaking Trapdoor, only holding a shotgun.

Soon you find her other victims turned into mindless butchers trying to kill you and some stray boxes.

Gameplay:

W/A/S/D : Movement;

Mouse: Aim/Turning around

Mouse1: Fire

  • You need to release fire in order to reload
  • You can shoot the crates to generate shrapnel which damage enemies
  • You may find Powerups dropped by crates/enemies
Powerups:
  • Red heart: gives 20 health
  • Purple lightning: reduces weapon cooldown by a lot
  • Yellow arrow: massive Speed bonus
Have Fun!
